timeline.bodyText: Just need to add the ASF license header to this source code
timeline.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I noticed.
I launched mvn clean verify -Psourcecheck but forgot that the build does not fail if not adding -Dcheckstyle.failOnViolation=true.
replies.author: mcollovati

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/core/camel-core/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/impl/engine/DefaultConfigurerResolverTest.java b/core/camel-core/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/impl/engine/DefaultConfigurerResolverTest.java
index cf24e5efa8e..a4ba3d9865e 100644
--- a/core/camel-core/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/impl/engine/DefaultConfigurerResolverTest.java
+++ b/core/camel-core/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/impl/engine/DefaultConfigurerResolverTest.java

@@ -1,3 +1,19 @@

 package org.apache.camel.impl.engine;
 
 import java.util.stream.Stream;

timeline.message:
CAMEL-15801: Restrict DefaultConfigurerResolver fallback resolution

DefaultConfigurerResolver fallbacks to ExtendedCamelContext FQCN
for names containing "CamelContext".
This change restricts fallback mechanims checking also that name
starts with "org.apache.camel".
